lang_instructions: Welcome to the Sunrise and Sunset Calculator! Discover the sunrise and sunset times for any location on Earth. To select a location, simply enter the city and country in the textbox below and press 'Calculate.' Alternatively, click directly on the globe for a precise selection. After choosing a location, you can pick a date to see the corresponding sunrise and sunset times.
lang_globe_instructions: Select and click on a location on the globe:
lang_answer1: Local time is calculated using Google's Time Zone API based on the geographic coordinates of the input location.
lang_question2: What locations can I search for?
lang_answer2: You can search for any city and country globally.
lang_question3: Why doesn't my location show up?
lang_answer3: Make sure to enter both the city and country for best results.
lang_answer4: The time of day when the Sun disappears, descending below the Earth's horizon.
lang_answer5: The time of day when the Sun appears, ascending above the Earth's horizon.
lang_privacy_statement: Â© 2024 Sunrise and Sunset Calculator. All Rights Reserved.
lang_tooltip_text: Use this calculator to find the local time and time zone based on the entered location or by clicking on the globe.
lang_error_location: Location not found for "{0}". Please try another city.
lang_error_fetchTime: Failed to fetch local time data.
lang_error_fetchSunTime: Failed to fetch sunrise and sunset times.
lang_error_retrieveSunTime: Unable to retrieve sunrise and sunset times.
